bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with jiu zha 酒齇 , wine sediments. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Zang fu biao ben xu shi yong yao shi 臟腑標本虛實用藥式 , wei 胃 , stomach: 標病：發熱蒸蒸，身 前熱，身前寒，發狂譫語，咽痹，上齒痛，口眼(cid:22000)斜，鼻痛鼽衄赤齇 , “Its external diseases: effusion of heat with steaming. The body’s front is [at times] hot; the body’s front is [at times] cold. [Patients] are mad and their speech isincoherent. They have a throat blockage, and the upper teeth ache. Mouth and eyes are slanted. The nose aches, with runny nose, nosebleed and red sediments ”.
